A Dictionary of Selected Synonyms in the Principal Indo-European Languages

note.p: Qvod si numer, dicitur par; si maginitudine aeqvabilis; si pondere, aeqvilibris.

bibl.title: 古漢語常用詞同義詞詞典

sense.def: one and the same; essentially the same
form one overall unity; be one and the same; be the same 其N一也 with respect to N they are the same
一律：in one and the same way; pervasively; completely
be the same in respect of N, be the same regarding N
undifferentiated equivalence; sameness; identity
regard as the same, consider to be of the same kind
make the same, cause to be the same
be the same in everyone/everything
be the same as N
one and the same thing
be the same
fit well together> be consistent with each other
the same; joint
do likewise to
sameness, identity
same
CHEMLA 2003:
be conformist
be the same in kind; be identical
identify oneself with; be the same thing as
be the same as; be equal to; be identical with, have the same; share
unify, standardise
be the same with respect to
agree as to (e.g. desires, but differ as to function); be the same in 同類 "be the same in kind"
be the same (has to have two distinct grammatical subjects!)
in a uniform way
be the same as the contextually determinate N2 with respect to N1
have the same> share in the same, join the same
be the same as N; identify oneself with N
have the same N1 with N2
in the same way, identically
consider to be the same
sameness
(of several subejcts) be basically all the same, be in concord, be in harmony, to converge
converge in spirit with
be the same; be equal
adjust and coordinate, standardise
the same, one and the same
be the same
be the same with regard to (something)
be even-handed; be impartial; be one and the same to all; be consistent
single even-handed overall vision
in one and the same way
same 并時
a certain (same), the same (whatever it is)
the same (year); that self-same (day etc)
(in mathematical operations:) be the same as, equals
exocentric: a certain place
be the same
be the same as
to be comparable; to be equal
equal position
be well-aligned> be basically the same
become basically the same, come to act along the same lines
cause to be the same> align, harmonise
regard as the same; see no difference between
levelling, evening out, putting things on a par
to have the same N, share N
one-like > be the same, be identical, be one and the same
the same
one kind > be the same, be identical; be one and the same; be the same way
be the same; be in accordance with each other
be of the same kind (as N)
BUDDH: be not two > be non-dualistic, nondual; SANSKRIT advaya
be no different
be completely the same
same
identity and difference
(the determination of) identity and difference; the true identity of things
it makes no difference whether S1 (or: S1 or S2)
be the same
be the same
be one and the same
be in no way different
in exactly the same way
in exactly the same way
be the same as the contextually determinate N2 with respect to N1
be the same as Nab{S}
be (structually) the same as Nab{S}
be the same thing as the person or thing referred to by 是
be the same with respect to N, to share N
unify, make N neatly uniform
be consistently adjusted
非道也“that is not (identical with/nothing other than) the Way" : be none other than, be identical with N
X字也"X is his given name/style": N is used as a name for the word itself, i.e. is autonymous in Bertrand Russell's terminology
我也"that is me": be none other than N
理也，義也 “principled nature, i.e. righteousness": id est, i.e., that is to say, more specifically
be the same as N, be no different from N
be of the same kind
share in common
